channel.title: Worse Mom Than You
channel.itunes:subtitle: Find your trail. Great hikes and outdoor adventures.
channel.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
channel.itunes:summary: Are you the worst mom ever? You have competition. Let's face it. We're all screwing it up. Join Carrie Hartman and Estie Miller as they discuss their frequent parenting gaffes and talk to other moms about their humorous fails with food, technology, behavior, healthcare and old standbys like homework and the tooth fairy. You'll hear reassuring stories of incompetence that are sure to remind you that there is always a worse mom than you.
channel.description: Are you the worst mom ever? You have competition. Let's face it. We're all screwing it up. You'll hear reassuring stories of incompetence that are sure to remind you that there is always a worse mom than you.

item.itunes:title: Crazy Lunch Mom
item.title: S01 EP01 Crazy Lunch Mom
item.itunes:author: Carrie Hartman & Estie Miller
item.itunes:subtitle: In the premier episode we meet Heather, aka, crazy lunch mom. This bombshell personal trainer wants her kids to be healthy too and explains how she painstakingly packs her daughter nutritious lunch foods, which come home exactly how they left, in their containers. Plus, Carrie confesses that she's become an annoying, nagging nightmare who will do anything to come between her son and french fries.
